column1: Weighted magnetic resonance image size (256, 256, 1) in T2, illustrating the skull of a man of 37 years old, of coronal section n°83 starting from the back of the skull. The image reveals the presence of the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 1854.9316 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4010.4492 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 177.9785 mm³, the left caudate nucleus of volume 145.0195 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 2102.7832 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 3856.2012 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 148.9746 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 135.7910 mm³, the right putamen of volume 21.0938 mm³ and the right nucleus accumbens of volume 31.6406 mm³.

Weighted magnetic resonance image size (256, 256, 1) in T2, illustrating the skull of a man of 37 years old, of coronal section n°83 starting from the back of the skull.
